Today, Gower is seeing 3 ft @9s W with fresh 19 mph NW winds, making for a blown-out surf. Tomorrow, conditions worsen with 7 ft @8s SW and strong 32 mph SW winds, keeping it messy and challenging. By the day after, the swell drops to 6 ft @8s WSW with light 10 mph SSW winds, offering a much cleaner surf experience at spots like Llangennith Beach. Best: day after.
